summary: Release the refreshed comparator UI with diff overlays and guided experiences.
Harden CRUD flows with controlled inputs and surfaced errors.
Expose the Event Log panel with filters, counters, and exports.
Show the Event Bus column with backlog and lag metrics.
Enable pause/resume controls to observe backlog growth and draining.
Provide the polling interval slider and lossiness messaging.
Add the trigger-based CDC adapter with write-amplification modelling.
Drive the schema change walkthrough with add/drop column flows.
Expose multi-table + transactional scenarios with apply-on-commit coordination.
Surface the metrics dashboard with backlog and lag percentiles.
Enable guided tooltips and glossary walkthrough content.
